title: Artificial Intelligence Ethics Act
content: Establishes guidelines for ethical AI development and deployment. Ensures transparency, accountability, and fairness in automated decision-making systems.

title: Digital Identity Protection Law
content: Provides safeguards for personal digital identities. Regulates identity verification, storage, and prevention of unauthorized data usage.

title: Remote Work Regulation Act
content: Defines labor standards for remote and hybrid employees. Covers work hours, cybersecurity requirements, and employer responsibilities.

title: Blockchain Compliance Framework
content: Introduces rules for blockchain-based transactions. Ensures transparency, anti-fraud measures, and legal recognition of smart contracts.

title: Digital Accessibility Act
content: Requires digital platforms and applications to be accessible for all users, including individuals with disabilities, following global accessibility standards.

title: Online Misinformation Control Act
content: Establishes mechanisms to detect, flag, and prevent the spread of false or misleading information across online platforms.

title: Data Localization and Sovereignty Law
content: Mandates that sensitive user data be stored and processed within national boundaries to ensure privacy and national security.

title: Green Technology Regulation
content: Encourages the development and use of eco-friendly technologies. Offers incentives for companies reducing carbon emissions through innovation.

title: Digital Advertising Standards Act
content: Regulates online advertising practices to prevent manipulation, protect consumer rights, and ensure transparency in digital marketing.

title: Cybercrime Prevention and Enforcement Law
content: Defines offenses related to hacking, phishing, and data theft. Provides law enforcement agencies with protocols for cyber investigation and prosecution.
